channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The stock market gains the most when this political party occupies the White House
item.description: The S&P 500’s annualized total return has been 11.0% in years when a Democrat is president and Congress is Republican-controlled.

item.title: FarmDroid obtains over $11M to deploy its modular robot globally

item.title: ‘I have few close friends’: I’m 69, retired, single and have amassed $3.6 million. What should I do with my fortune?
item.description: “Many weeks I spend more on my three rescue kitties and one rescue mouse than I do on myself.”

item.title: Cohere launches new AI models to bridge global language divide
item.description: Cohere released two new open weight AI models from its Aya initiative that looks to expand LLM performance for languages other than English.

item.title: DeepMind and Hugging Face release SynthID to watermark LLM-generated text
item.description: SynthID makes subtle changes to LLM-generated text to create a statistical signature while preserving the quality of the output.

item.title: OpenAI CEO responds to report of GPT-5 Orion coming later this year: ‘Fake news out of control’
item.description: It's an interesting quasi-denial given how precise The Verge report is, noting specific details about Orion's supposed release plans.

item.title: These 3 struggles sent this retired couple back to the U.S. after a move overseas
item.description: Moving to Portugal in retirement was a dream — but they weren’t ready for the reality.

item.title: ‘I have little faith in the world right now’: My husband died after a long illness and our joint bank account was frozen. How could this happen?
item.description: “Am I still the joint owner of this account?”
